Articles.Content:
So I had an old power supply lying around and I remembered seeing that you could turn it into a power supply for RC battery chargers. I spent about $10 on parts and started working on it. A few hours (and a nasty soldering iron burn) later, I had turned this.

Into this.

Now if only it weren\'t windy, freezing, and possibly raining today, I might have been able to actually fly my plane.
